translations: n．挑衅，激怒：刺激、激怒或引起争端的行为或言论。

phrs.translation: 对于这种挑衅我们不能置之不理, 对于这种挑衅

sentences.sentence: So far the police have refused to respond to their provocations.
sentences.translation: 截至目前为止，警方并未对他们的挑衅作出反应。

sentences.sentence: Then one day a few years ago, out of my mouth came a sentence that would eventually become my reply to any and all provocations: I don't talk about that anymore.
sentences.translation: 几年前的某一天，我说过一句话，这句话最终成为了我对任何挑衅的回应：我不再谈论那件事了。
对于这种挑衅，我们不能置之不理。
